```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)


pdata <- tibble(
    x = seq(0, 20),
)


for (n in seq(1, 12, 2)) {
    cname <- paste0("y", n)
    pdata <- pdata |> mutate({{ cname }} := dpois(`x`, n))

}
ps<-list()
i=1
for (n in seq(1,12,2)) {
    cname <-paste0("y",n)
    p<-ggplot(data=pdata)+geom_col(aes(x=x,y=.data[[cname]]))+ggtitle(paste0("Poisson with mean ",n))
    print(class(p), length(p))
    ps[[i]]<-p
    print(length(ps))
    i<-i+1
}
grid.arrange(grobs=ps)
```
